title: Missing Ward Skins on this patch
body: On the most recent patch a few of ward skins are missing from the game. Is anyone else having this problem with ward skins too?

replies.body: me two there are 2 wards that I unlocked but they havent appeared in my inventory yet.
Me too! Missing lantern of the serpent ward, which is my go to ward :( Won't let me submit a ticket either, keeps bugging out and saying I need to sign in when I already have. Grrr Riot pls.
It's a visual error in the client, you still own the ward but the bug is preventing you from seeing it. A fix for the bug is under development.
Thank God! I thought I was the only person experiencing this, me being an avid ward collector. It matches my in-game skins! {{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}}

At least we have info on the situation. Hopefully they can fix this sooner than later. The ward skin I'm missing at the moment is the 2014 victorious ward skin. I've still got my royal crab and season 3 ward skins. I just can't see or select the 2014 ward skin.
I'd be happy to check into this for you!  Are there any specific skin wards you feel that you might be missing?

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=Q8FiKW1V,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-07-27T18:15:48.551+0000)
>
> I'd be happy to check into this for you!  Are there any specific skin wards you feel that you might be missing?

I'm for sure missing the lantern of the Serpent ward and banner of the horse ward, there may be others.

Thanks for following up with me on this.  I looked into this, and everything looks okay to me.  When you have some time, [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can help with your specific issue individually and figure out what's going on.  Thanks for your patience!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=Q8FiKW1V,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2016-07-27T18:35:13.210+0000)
>
> Thanks for following up with me on this.  I looked into this, and everything looks okay to me.  When you have some time, [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can help with your specific issue individually and figure out what's going on.  Thanks for your patience!

	
R041 (Riot Games Player Support)
Jul 27, 16:36 PDT

R041 here from Riot Games Technical Support. Thank you for submitting this bug report. We are aware of the issue and are working hard to get it fixed. Unfortunately, I cannot provide any estimate for the completion date at this time. To avoid confusing or disappointing players, we try to only announce these dates when we are sure we can meet the arrival schedule.

I appreciate your patience and understanding regarding this issue, and thank you again for taking time out of your day to send us this report. Please let me know if you have any questions.

R041,
Riot Player Support
Technical Support 

Pretty vague response. I can only assume is am not the only one with this issue. 

This is vague at best, can I get a more clear answer

Between your post and ticket submission, we dug deeper and found that some players might be experiencing this visual issue.  Some ward skins are visually not appearing for selection, but they are still on the account.  Thanks for helping us investigate this issue!
There is a bug preventing Ward Skins from displaying in the client. You still own them - it's just a visual error. Sit tight while a fix is developed.
